TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit EventListener extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public MustInherit Class EventListener Implements IDisposable
public ref class EventListener abstract : IDisposable

summary.span: 提供用于启用和禁用事件源中事件的方法。

span.span: Provides methods for enabling and disabling events from event sources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件侦听器表示生成的事件源的所有事件的目标 (对象) 当前的应用程序域中的实现。An event listener represents the target for all events generated by event source ( object) implementations in the current application domain. 创建一个新的事件侦听器后，它将以逻辑方式附加到该应用程序域中的所有事件源。When a new event listener is created, it is logically attached to all event sources in that application domain. > [!NOTE] > 此类型实现接口。This type implements the interface. 完成后使用类型的操作后，你必须释放它直接或间接。When you have finished using the type, you must dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，调用其中的方法`try` / `catch`块。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅 接口主题中的“使用实现 IDisposable 的对象”一节。For more information, see the “Using an Object that Implements IDisposable” section in the interface topic. 事件侦听器可以启用或禁用每个当前事件源按通过使用事件级别 () 和事件关键字 () 以进一步限制的一套将事件发送到侦听器。An event listener can enable or disable on a per-current event source basis by using event levels () and event keywords () to further restrict the set of events to be sent to the listener. 侦听器可以还将任意命令发送到特定的当前事件源使用方法。The listener can also send arbitrary commands to a specific current event source by using the method. 命令的含义是特定于事件源的实现。The meanings of the commands are specific to the implementation of the event source. 如果中的属性用于启用或禁用事件的对象是，应用程序域中的所有事件源受到都影响。If the property in the object that is used to enable or disable events is , all event sources in the application domain are affected. 可以在单个应用程序域中定义多个事件侦听器。Multiple event listeners can be defined in a single application domain. 每个侦听器是逻辑上独立于其他侦听器，以便启用或禁用通过一个侦听器的事件的影响仅该侦听器。Each listener is logically independent of the other listeners so that events that are enabled or disabled by one listener affect only that listener. 可能与发送命令方法来执行操作 （如垃圾回收或刷新数据） 的语义操作会影响其他侦听器，但这是异常，而不是规则。It is possible for commands sent with the method to do a semantic operation (such as a garbage collection or flushing data) that affects the other listeners, but this is the exception rather than the rule. 每个事件源将保留它发送到事件的事件侦听器的列表。Each event source keeps a list of event listeners that it sends events to. 与每个事件源的侦听器对相关联的一组筛选条件。A set of filtering criteria is associated with each event source-listener pair. 这些条件确定事件该侦听器将接收为当前事件源。These criteria determine the events that listener will receive for the current event source. 侦听器接收事件在其方法。Listeners receive the events on their method. 因此的子类必须重写此方法以执行一些有用的数据。Therefore, subclasses of must override this method to do something useful with the data. 创建新的事件源时，调用方法。When a new event source is created, the method is called. 每个当前的事件侦听器获取恰好有一个调用为每个可以将其发送的当前事件源记录消息。Every current event listener gets exactly one call for every current event source that can send it log messages. 创建事件侦听器后，一系列调用以通知创建侦听器之前存在的所有事件源的新的侦听器。When an event listener is created, a series of calls are made to notify the new listener of all the event sources that existed before the listener was created.

Protected Sub New ()
protected: EventListener();

span.span: Creates a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建一个新实例时会禁用所有事件。All events are disabled when a new instance is created. 使用使事件的方法。Use the methods to enable events.

MemberSignature.Value: public void DisableEvents (System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource eventSource);
.method public hidebysig instance void DisableEvents(class System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource eventSource) cil managed
public: void DisableEvents(System::Diagnostics::Tracing::EventSource ^ eventSource);

param.name: eventSource
param.span: 要禁用其事件的事件源。

span.span: The event source to disable events for.

summary.span: 禁用指定事件源的所有事件。

span.span: Disables all events for the specified event source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性`eventSource`是，已为此事件侦听器禁用的应用程序域中的所有事件源的事件。If the property for `eventSource` is , events for all event sources in the application domain are disabled for this event listener.

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void Dispose ();
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
Public Overridable Sub Dispose ()
public: virtual void Dispose();

summary.span: 释放 类的当前实例使用的资源。

span.span: Releases the resources used by the current instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 `Dispose` 后，应调用 。Call `Dispose` when you are finished using the . `Dispose` 方法使 处于不可用状态。The `Dispose` method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用`Dispose`，必须释放对所有引用以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，占用。After calling `Dispose`, you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

summary.span: 启用指定事件源的事件。

span.span: Enables events for the specified event source.

param.span: 要启用其事件的事件源。

The level of events to enable.

summary.span: 启用具有指定详细级别或更低详细级别的指定事件源的事件。

span.span: Enables events for the specified event source that has the specified verbosity level or lower.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性中指定`eventSource`是，应用程序域中的所有事件源受到都影响。If the property in the specified `eventSource` is , all event sources in the application domain are affected.

span.span: Enables events for the specified event source that has the specified verbosity level or lower, and matching keyword flags.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性中指定`eventSource`是，应用程序域中的所有事件源受到都影响。If the property in the specified `eventSource` is , all event sources in the application domain are affected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性中指定`eventSource`是，应用程序域中的所有事件源受到都影响。If the property in the specified `eventSource` is , all event sources in the application domain are affected.

MemberSignature.Value: public event EventHandler<System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSourceCreatedEventArgs> EventSourceCreated;
.event class System.EventHandler`1<class System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSourceCreatedEventArgs> EventSourceCreated
Public Custom Event EventSourceCreated As EventHandler(Of EventSourceCreatedEventArgs)
public: event EventHandler<System::Diagnostics::Tracing::EventSourceCreatedEventArgs ^> ^ EventSourceCreated;

summary.span: 当事件源（ 对象）附加到调度程序时发生。

span.span: Occurs when an event source ( object) is attached to the dispatcher.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时发生所有现有的事件源的事件侦听器，则也会创建与该事件侦听器的创建后创建的任何事件源。The occurs for all existing event sources when the event listener is created, as well as for any event sources that are created after the event listener's creation.

MemberSignature.Value: public static int EventSourceIndex (System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource eventSource);
.method public static hidebysig int32 EventSourceIndex(class System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource eventSource) cil managed
public: static int EventSourceIndex(System::Diagnostics::Tracing::EventSource ^ eventSource);

param.name: eventSource
param.span: 要查找其索引的事件源。

span.span: The event source to find the index for.

summary.span: 获取表示指定事件源的较小非负数。

span.span: Gets a small non-negative number that represents the specified event source.

returns.span: 表示指定的事件源的较小非负数。

span.span: A small non-negative number that represents the specified event source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的值标识适合于索引数组的事件源。The value returned by identifies an event source that is suitable for indexing an array. 此整数是应用程序域中唯一的。This integer is unique within the application domain. 事件侦听器可能会有用存储有关连接到其每个事件源附加信息。An event listener might find it useful to store additional information about each event source that is connected to it. 返回的值允许此额外的信息，从而有效地存储在一个可展开数组，如`List`。The value returned by allows this extra information to be efficiently stored in a expandable array such as `List`.

MemberSignature.Value: public event EventHandler<System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventWrittenEventArgs> EventWritten;
.event class System.EventHandler`1<class System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventWrittenEventArgs> EventWritten
Public Event EventWritten As EventHandler(Of EventWrittenEventArgs)
public: event EventHandler<System::Diagnostics::Tracing::EventWrittenEventArgs ^> ^ EventWritten;

summary.span: 当事件已由事件源（ 对象）写入时发生，其中事件侦听器已为该事件源启用了事件。

span.span: Occurs when an event has been written by an event source ( object) for which the event listener has enabled events.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal virtual void OnEventSourceCreated (System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource eventSource);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnEventSourceCreated(class System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventSource eventSource) cil managed
protected public: virtual void OnEventSourceCreated(System::Diagnostics::Tracing::EventSource ^ eventSource);

span.span: The event source.

summary.span: 当创建该事件侦听器且将新事件源附加到侦听器时，对所有现有事件源执行了调用。

span.span: Called for all existing event sources when the event listener is created and when a new event source is attached to the listener.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件源实现应注意在实例化的事件侦听器时，这些回调对现有事件源中发出。Event source implementations should be aware that these callbacks are issued for existing event sources when the event listener is instantiated. 在多线程环境中，则可能回调之前回调。In a multithreaded environment, it is possible for callbacks to occur before the callback.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal abstract void OnEventWritten (System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventWrittenEventArgs eventData);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnEventWritten(class System.Diagnostics.Tracing.EventWrittenEventArgs eventData) cil managed
Protected Friend MustOverride Sub OnEventWritten (eventData As EventWrittenEventArgs)
protected public: abstract void OnEventWritten(System::Diagnostics::Tracing::EventWrittenEventArgs ^ eventData);

param.name: eventData
param.span: 描述该事件的事件自变量。

span.span: The event arguments that describe the event.

summary.span: 每次事件源写入事件时都执行调用，其中事件侦听器为事件源启用了事件。

span.span: Called whenever an event has been written by an event source for which the event listener has enabled events.
